name: trampolinist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who practises the sport of trampolining: She was a very good trampolinist when she was at school. Trampolinists typically work out six days a week for at least six hours a day. See
trampoline
CasarsaGuru/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe stronger and more flexible you are, the better a trampolinist you'll be.Strength in the legs and back are essential for elite trampolinists.The 20-year-old is the first trampolinist ever to represent Great Britain at the Games.
